title: "new tab + sign" moved to far right
content:
The new tab + sign, until now located immediately after the last open tab, has moved to the far right of the tab bar. Although it is still usable, I prefer the old location. Was this an (un/)intentional change by Firefox or is it a glitch? Is there a way to restore it to its original position? I read the similar question by GrokSurf (9/1/17): https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1173831 and the solutions presented didn't seem to apply to my situation: -The only things on my tab bar are my tabs and, to the far right, the print and new tab buttons. -My theme is the default theme. -I opened Firefox in safe mode and the new tab button was still on the far right.

Any help will be appreciated!

FF v 86.0 Windows 10 Home
creator: DeElmo

title: HTTP Error 400. The size of the request headers is too long.
content: - This is the error I get when trying to open up some MSN windows in a new Firefox tab. Any suggestions to prevent this error?
creator: michael.oyola

title: Articles are all being reformatted before opening
content: I've had a browsing issue suddenly pop up. When at MSN.com, after clicking on an articles, they're all brought up reformatted with a black header and very few graphics. I've attached an image of how almost every article appears. Any idea why this is happening? How do I return it to showing the article and pictures without this new format being applied. Thanks
creator: gehrlich1

title: time of death when we retrieve some web site direfox dev 87.0b3 (64-bit)
content:
después de la ultima actualización 87.0b3 (64-bit) mi firefox para desarrolladores no carga las paginas a menos q se le vuelva a dar refrescar.

esto es normal en esta versión? digo, si no soy el único q lo experimenta.. yo no tenia problemas hasta q se actualizo a esta versión.

quedo a la espera de vuestros comentarios.. saludos MAD++
creator: alpha.nain

title: New Feb. 2021 print dialog shows same number of sheets of paper needed when printing on both sides as when printing on one side.
content: Minor bug, but bug report system is gone, so leaving here.
creator: tgordo49

title: Firefox Forcing Secure Connection when link points to unsecured connection
content: Firefox is forcing https:// website address when link is addressed as not secure.
creator: redeshazer

title: Print
content:
in the new version of Firefox 86.0 the " print preview " has been removed = WHY??? 

I now have to install an additional add-on again!

I don't understand why this was done, what sense or logic does it make? And can't even Firefox run for a few months without a change?

What advice could you give me on how to get back to the old "print preview"?

The logic that remains for me is to change the browser soon.

With kind regards

anton

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
creator: karaton2
